channel.title: Should this be added? [Nether portal system]
channel.description:
Well recently I built myself a portal to the Nether. the way the current system works is if there is another portal within 1024 blocks (X and Z), then your portal will link to one already made in the nether. BUT when you return, you will be sent to the players portal that created the portal. (As in, they build a portal, it makes one in the nether... your portal links to the one in the nether due to the check.. when you leave, you will be sent to the other players portal).
in my opinion, this is a HUGE inconveniance, because the nearest portal to my house is about 600 blocks away over mountains, and rivers and the like.
I was browsing the bucket forum looking for a fix, and I found this: [url=http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/tp-fix-unether-v0-1-get-back-to-your-own-nether-portal-1000.22896/#post-510279]http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/tp-fix-unether-v0-1-get-back-to-your-own-nether-portal-1000.22896/#post-510279[/url]
it keeps track of what portal you enter. your portal will still go to the one that was created by the first person, but when you leave, it will send you to your OWN portal, instead of the other players.
I think this would be a great addition.. So if you support, Please say so :D

item.title: Should this be added? [Nether portal system]
item.dc:creator: @k4den k4den
item.description:
@k4den wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:12, topic:406690”][quote author=k4den link=topic=503689.msg3685905#msg3685905 date=1311839677]
Oh I read the thread about your minecart track.
I hadn’t seen the latest replies, seems that Mopar will be adding some residence thing.

but either way, how will that allow us to build in that area?.. you can’t build in other people’s residence?
[/quote]

The residence would just be in the regular world to protect spawn, not in the nether.

About this plugin, not a bad idea, but doesn’t it not allow you to actually travel through the nether? From a quick look at the code, it will teleport you back to the portal you came through regardless of which portal you go through:
https://github.com/Ulrar/uNether/blob/master/net/ulrar/unether/uNetherPL.java
Example:
You go through your nether portal, it is saved, you travel 1000 blocks in the nether (8000 in the real world) and come to my nether portal and go through, wanting to come out on my land, right? But your position is saved and it shoots you back out your nether portal again.

Does it not work like that?[/quote]

I did have a look through his github, but thats something I didnt think about…
Wonder if there’s a way to modify it to check if you enter back through the portal you were sent to, or another one…
Maybe I should have a look through the bukkit API and see what I can come up with…

on the other hand, just adding the residence to the normal world would also be convenient. it would also solve the problem for noobs are ftw.

@noobs are ftw, sorry, didn’t realise… i was just skipping through the posts and i thought i saw his name pop us somewhere in relation to building it =P

Read full topic
item.source: Should this be added? [Nether portal system]

Example:

item.title: Should this be added? [Nether portal system]
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“k4den, post:9, topic:406690”]also if your portal would appear within a certain area, you can’t build your own portal…
therefor its impossible to build your own portal in the nether if that happens.

SO the next best thing is to have this mod so you can teleport back to your own portal.

Don’t judge my interlectual capabilities. I’m not some retarded 13 year old who doesn’t look into things before he does shit.
I did my research and found this mod.

if you want to play your little game of trying to make people feel inferior and make your e-penis feel big, go right ahead, but i wont put up with your shit.[/quote]
da fuck? yes you can build your own portal… and the protections on nether spawn may be removed soon… lurk more.

Read full topic

Don’t judge my interlectual capabilities. I’m not some retarded 13 year old who doesn’t look into things before he does shit.
I did my research and found this mod.

if you want to play your little game of trying to make people feel inferior and make your e-penis feel big, go right ahead, but i wont put up with your shit.

item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:7, topic:406690”]That’s not the point of this topic. It’s to reintroduce the convenience that we had with SMP nether in 1.5 (or 1.6, idr).[/quote]that happend in SMP earlier versions aswell… its becuase the nether portals go to the portal thats already made in the nether area becuase of how the neather is designed… every 8 blocks is is 1 block in nether… thats how its always been…

there is that option, ye… but why have unnecisary portals clogging up the nether in random ass locations… why not just add this mod which would make things a lot more simple for everyone.

because its simple to devide. its called math.
maybe you should learn it?
[/quote]

How about you give better answers instead of questioning his intellectual ability?[/quote]
because its not hard to multiply by 8 and go to the nether to that location?
